name: SIIG CN-GP1011-S3 Gigabit Ethernet PCI Network Adapter
Features: [Crossover detection and auto-correction, Auto-negotiation intelligently detects and determines 10/100/1000 Mbps and full-/half-duplex, Checksum and Segmentation Task-offload reduce CPU workloads for enhanced system response and network scalability, Supports Flow Control, Layer 2 Priority Queuing, VLAN Tag and Jumbo Frames, LEDs to indicate link and activity status]
